INITIATE_CARGO_SCAN_2.message: Coinnigh an luas agus an cúrsa céanna chun scanadh lasta a dhéanamh.

NOTHING_DETECTED.message: Níor bhraitheamar aon lasta mídhleathach. Lean ort.

OUTLAW_DETECTED_1.message: {ship_label} is flown by a known outlaw. Attack and destroy!

OUTLAW_DETECTED_3.message: Hah, caught! You will not leave this system alive!

POLICE_TAUNT_3.message: Ní bhaintear tairbhe as coiriúlacht a amadáin!

RESPECT_THE_LAW_1.message: Géill don dlí! Ní bhaintear tairbhe as coiriúlacht i réaltchóras {system}!

RESPECT_THE_LAW_2.message: Tá tú i réaltchóras {system} anois. Géill don dlí!

TAKE_A_HIKE.message: Ok, tá seans eile agat. Gread leat!
